div.p: S61/5846, unit 749, VPRS 1189/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.
I have the honor to solicit, that you will be pleased to sanction the following expenditure during the third quarter of this year.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: Wages according to the rate of payments allowed last quarter

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: to which sum I would beg leave to be added the amount left available of the wages fund of last quarter, vize:

MS file annotation: 'Some portion of the amount is already expended; for instance 60£ for [...] dromedary to Mr Landells. other claims are constantly coming in (for instance Mr [...]) charges on [...], English fish &c for which purposes this fund is supposed to be distinctly intended; & the only Government grant available for the purpose'.
